RecipeDef.label: make orangice
RecipeDef.description: Make orangice by deassemble thermo damper. Needs excess thermo damper to do.

RecipeDef.label: recolor orangice to blue
RecipeDef.description: Recolor orangice to blue. Needs excess thermo damper to do.

RecipeDef.label: recolor single orangice to orange
RecipeDef.description: Recolor a singe orangice back to orange.

ThingDef.Name: OrangiceBase
ThingDef.label: orangice
ThingDef.description: A powerful rare material, icy stuff but orange and doesn't melt. Can be shaped into nearly any form, but takes really long time to do this.

ThingDef.label: blue orangice
ThingDef.description: A powerful rare material, icy stuff but orange and doesn't melt. Can be shaped into nearly any form, but takes really long time to do this.\n\nThis processed verison is blue.

ThingDef.label: centaur pants
ThingDef.description: A pair of pants suited for an equine body. Now we know how a horse would wear pants.

ThingDef.label: centaur horseshoes Set
ThingDef.description: A set of horseshoes for a centaur to protect their hooves, also gives them a minor moving speed boost.

ThingDef.label: centaur T-shirt
ThingDef.description: A modified T-shirt for use by centaurs.
Designed for centaurs, this collared shirt comes with skirting and tiedowns to suit.
ThingDef.label: button-down centaur shirt
centaur parka
ThingDef.description: A parka for staying warm in even the coldest of temperatures. Modified for a centaur wearer.
A long duster coat for blocking the sun and grit of the outdoors. Modified for a centaur wearer.
ThingDef.label: centaur duster
centaur jacket
ThingDef.description: A tough jacket to stop scrapes and bruises, and to keep one warm in chilly weather. Modified for a centaur wearer.

ThingDef.label: centaur plate armor
ThingDef.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet. Modified for a centaur wearer.

ThingDef.label: centaur shield armor
ThingDef.description:
A suit of light powered armor for a centaur wearer with projectile-repulsion device and toxic defense. Layered plasteel-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a centaur to wear the armor and still move easily.

The shield of it will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, but does nothing against melee attacks or heat. It shuts down instantly if hit by EMP. It DOES NOT prevents the wearer from firing out.

Armor like this is often used by imperial janissaries and rapid-incursion space marines.

Additional weight and materials are required when compared to humanoid armor, allowing for protection of the flanks.

ThingDef.label: centaur flak vest
ThingDef.description: Flak armor modified for a centaur wearer. Additional weight and materials are required when compared to humanoid vests, allowing for protection of the flanks. This armor design does not protect the limbs.

ThingDef.label: centaur flak pants
ThingDef.description: Modified pants suited to a centaur. The addition of armored plating grants effective protection from attacks without restricting movements.

ThingDef.label: centaur flak jacket
ThingDef.description: An armoured overcoat suited for a centaur. A step below plate armor, the defense offered is by no means insignificant and still doesn't impede movement.

ThingDef.label: centaur marine armor
ThingDef.description: A modified light powered armor suited to a centaur. Layered plasteel-weave plates are very effective at stopping attacks, with few vulnerable joint sections. Neuro-memetic assistors allow a human to wear the armor and still move easily.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial janissaries and rapid-incursion space marines.

ThingDef.label: centaur marine helmet
ThingDef.description: A centaur marine armor helmet, with a built-in status computer and layered plasteel-weave plates, also providing toxic resist. \n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial janissaries and rapid-incursion space marines.

ThingDef.label: marine clocked helmet
ThingDef.description:
A marine armor helmet, with a built-in status computer and layered plasteel-weave plates.

Armor like this is often used by imperial janissaries and rapid-incursion space marines. 

This modified verison is invisible, powered by clocking shield technology, but behaviored as a normal helmet and requires more skills to make, allowing someone showing it best face and hair without the thread of exposing head, original designed for centaur but available to all species.

ThingDef.label: antimass belt
ThingDef.description: A anti-mass device. It helps reduce the mass of a centaur to allows them getting into transporters.

ThingDef.label: charge shotgun
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot shotgun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.

ThingDef.label: thermo damper
ThingDef.description: A durable container, act as a powerful power core, AKA "Environment Thermoelectric Reactor", that generates energy by absorb environment heat. When you placing it indoor, it will drain heat in the room. This technology is developed by unknowns but likly centaurs, and is beyond even most glitterworld societies. Its internal workings are a mystery to all minds, althought it likly extracts energy directly from a singularity in it, means it likly explode on hit.\n\nThis device is however much lighter than it looks like.

ResearchProjectDef.label: trishot
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you craft an ultra weapon that used by centaur, Trishot, a powerful massive bow with long range that fires triple heavy arrows with delay-setoff thermal-discharging-bomb for long distances in a single burst.

ThingDef.label: trishot
ThingDef.description: A powerful massive bow with long range that fires triple heavy arrows with delay-setoff thermal-discharging-bomb for long distances in a single burst. It requires powerful arms to use it that only available to Centaurs. With a massive weight and sharp edge on it, it can also be a deadly melee weapon.

li.desc: Icos mode that launch empowered hyper shot, deals more damage and shoot longer range, blast over walls but can't fire at close-up targets.
li.label: icos shot

ThingDef.label: blue frozen matter
ThingDef.description: A puddle of sticky freezing chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: orange frozen matter
ThingDef.description: A puddle of sticky freezing chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: auto crossbow turret
ThingDef.description: A ultra-long-ranged mass blasting crossbow turret that can shoot over walls, fires quadruple heavy arrows with delay-setoff thermal-discharging-bomb in a single burst. It requires advanced component to be replaced after overuse. It can't fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.

ThingDef.label: hyper crossbow turret
ThingDef.description: A self-loading heavy crossbow designed to attach to a turret.

ThingDef.label: slingline
ThingDef.description: A simple weapon that throws hard stuff loop over walls to hit enemies, also can be a deadly melee weapon.

ThingDef.label: triple battery
ThingDef.description: Stores electricity for later use. Charged batteries explode when exposed to rain or fire. This modified version has triple storage than normal one.

ThingDef.label: artificial hivebox
ThingDef.description: Slowly producing insect jelly by breeding insects in it. If it got destroyed, it may release these dangerous mega insect everywhere.
